titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2217) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-247, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2217. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 85.

bill.summary: 10/16/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2217 (FY 2002 Department of the Interior and related agencies appropriations).
